1.0.name: wordpress/wpcountdown
1.0.description:
Easily add JQuery Countdown easily to your page/post with one shortcode only

Example:

[wpc_countdown]

Will show next 7 days countdown

[wpc_countdown targetdate="2012-05-17"]

format target date "Year-Month-Day"

[wpc_countdown targetdate="2012-05-17-23-59-59"]

format target date "Year-Month-Day-Hour-Minute-Second"

[wpc_countdown targetdate="2012-05-17" before="<div>" after="</div>"]

=> if you want to use wrapper.

See my article WordPress Countdown Plugin for details.
